medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began yesterday morning as a gradual onset in the RUQ, which increasingly became more sharp and severe. After eating a cheeseburger last night, the pain worsened and continued throughout the night. Patient also reports subjective fever/chills, nausea, chest pain, and shortness of breath.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of Tylenol induced hepatitis causing liver failure approximately ___ years ago, history of kidney stones, past surgical history includes tooth extraction and lithotripsy.
